data.actual_result: They are searchable and shows up
data.expected_result: They should be hidden like on desktop and not show up at all
data.short_description: Blocked users shows up and is searchable in the quick switcher
data.steps_to_repro: - Block a user - Open the quick switcher, and observe how they may show up in the suggestion list. You can also search them up by writing their name#discrim. (You need to have mutual servers)
